H0.text: Name the French artist (1839-1906) whose painting 'The Card Players' is one of the most expensive ever sold. Claude Monet

H1.text: Name the French artist (1839-1906) whose painting 'The Card Players' is one of the most expensive ever sold. Pierre-Auguste Renoir

H2.text: Name the French artist (1839-1906) whose painting 'The Card Players' is one of the most expensive ever sold. Edgar Degas

H3.text: Name the French artist (1839-1906) whose painting 'The Card Players' is one of the most expensive ever sold. Cézanne

A4.text: Cézanne painted five versions of The Card Players (Les Joueurs de cartes) in 1890 and 1895.

A5.text: One of the five versions of Cézanne's The Card Players was sold in 2011 to the Royal Family of Qatar for a price variously estimated at between $250 million ($349.4 million today) and possibly as high as $300 million ($419.3 million today), either price signifying a new mark for highest price for a painting up to that date.
